physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Cachectic with bitemporal wasting; abdomen flat and nontender, striae without pigmentation; slightly edematous feet; blanching erythematous macular rash on the dorsal surface; proximal muscle weakness with severe wasting in the thighs; pubic-hair distribution Tanner stage 5; testicular volume estimated at 15 ml bilaterally.

Poor dentition; severe diffuse muscle tenderness; edematous ankles; decreased strength (4 out of 5) in ankles and lower legs; nonblanching macular erythematous rash on thighs; decreased sensation of light touch over legs; positive antinuclear antibodies at a dilution of 1:40.

Cachectic; depressed affect; dry oral mucosa; abdomen scaphoid and soft with palpable liver edge 3 cm below costal margin; lymph node palpated in right inguinal region; slightly jaundiced skin; bleeding laceration on head; healed laceration on arm; petechiae and 1+ edema of legs; stage II sacral decubitus ulcer; extremities cool to palpation.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Weight decreased from 51.3 kg to 42.9 kg.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Alert; cachectic; decubitus ulcer present; capillary blood glucose reported as 26 mg/dL; glucose administered; respiratory rate normal; skin slightly jaundiced with bleeding laceration on head, healed laceration on arm, petechiae and edema of legs.
